title: The Brazy Breakfast Blub
itunes:title: The Brazy Breakfast Blub
description:
WED 6/22 - LA's own YG stops by The Breakfast Club to talk about his new album "Still Brazy", why he doesn't replace every C with a B, the attack on his life and much more! Charlamagne addresses the sensational internet rumor of Gucci Mane being bloned--I mean cloned, during Donkey of the Day!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
